title: Annual Mobility Report 2024
text: Understanding the trends and conditions occurring in the North Florida will allow planners and engineers to prioritize resources more effectively as part of the North Florida Transportation Planning Organization’s (TPO) Congestion Management Process. The data presented are an essential part of making evidence-based decisions for the investment in mobility in North Florida. The data presented focuses on Clay, Duval, Nassau and St. Johns counties for the years 2017-2022 and 2023 when available. This report summarizes trends in the following topics:
